Always honest, always truthful, always motivating, always supporting, always smiling! Your smile suits you so well buddy, always keep that on! I am always there for you bro! Let us be our best selves - together! Best wishes!!

I just have one thing to say, I wish I met you earlier, brother. Actually, there is some more, I love your enthusiasm and your can-do attitude. All the love to you mate, the tears from the last day still haven't dried up! And don't forget RC AJ LLC bhi set karni hai!

Tiwari Ji! Tareef aapki nikli mere dil se: Me and you, two followers of - Baba Sehgal, one strong friendship! Thanks for always supporting me in hard times, bearing with my diagonally opposite ideology :P, adding all the fun in classes - Russian Revolution! Good luck to UCSD, the real MVP is coming! 

Footnotes:
"Aloo Ka Paratha"
"Tareef Teri"
"Rihanna O Rihanna"
"Eye to Eye"
"Angel"
"Habibi"
"Tajdar e haram"
G: Aloo Ka Paratha by Baba Sehgal

E: I love it when you laugh, it eases my worries. You were a godsend for my B.Tech project and I don't know how it could have been completed without you and your constant laughter. Moreover, I will forever remember how I could talk to you about anything anytime and feel better. Keep meeting me every now and then, brother!
Bade Bhaiya! You are one of the most righteous and truthful people I have ever known. Always stay the same! I am going to miss all those hugs! May you reach great heights in future! Best wishes!

Coding and solving problems with you - it was all so much fun! sweet memories! A lot of credit of my coding skills goes to you buddy, for you always kept pushing me to work hard. We are a team forever!! I have so many memories with you that it's hard to put a few here! All those trips, debugging code all night, doing contests, celebrating ranks..... I am going to miss all that so much! Always stay motivated, the way you are!
G: It's My Life What Ever I Wanna Do - by Vennu Mallesh

E:
Thank you for being around! I learnt some nice things seeing you buddy like going into detail of technical stuff, understanding everything to the core... I am going to miss your always warm tone and that cute smile haha. All the best for your future!! Learning with you was a great pleasure! 
PS: Teach me VIM and touch typing when you get time :')

You taught me how to take it easy when things don't go my way, to let go when even after putting all my efforts results don't turn out as expected. I owe this to you. On an unrelated note, I hope we manage to pull off an international trip together sometime soon, with our 'yo group' included. Hit me up in Bangalore soon, brother.
The most Jugaadu and manipulating person i have ever seen.

Bhopal buddies! Going home and coming back was so much fun with you! Endless chatting, chai and poha at Dodi... I will forever remember New Pappu and Pappu resort :P Thanks for being a true friend! May you reach great heights ahead!! Best wishes!
Highly ambitious guy and who wants to try out everything.

The most passionate and hardworking personality at IIT Indore. I get real motivation from you, seeing you work and grow. I still remember the days when you had just started with C++ and Java. We are both so much interested in old songs Hindi :P Whenever I listen to old songs, I remember you. Do teach me the recipe to Banana Shake vis Skype!
Best wishes for your bright future.
PS "Yaar mai padhta nhi hu to anxiety hone lagti hai"
G: Kisi Ki Muskurahaton Pe Ho Nisar

E: Best wishes to the smartest guy in the class! Always motivated by your love for math and coding!
Ask almost everything from his parents and follows it. His thinking is very realistic and maintains friendship with almost everyone.

How many memories we got? A lot. How many people we mocked? A lot. How many times we worried about our future? A lot. Everything with you was grand and I am sure will continue to be. You taught me how to chill and showed me what the value of a calm, composed mind is. You're a live wire who I love a lot. Let's skip queues again soon, brother? Till next time, baithe hue hai!
He can talk to any person any time and can say anything.
He mostly talks in intellectual mode and the quote "Sab Moh Maya Hai" perfectly fits him.
The Great Runner of IITI. He has a amazing perspective about life. "chal startup khol lete hai" is his pet dialogue. He has been my friend for more than 8 years now.

From arrays to RDDs, the journey with you has been awesome! Great luck dude! I don't know anyone else with such a great knowledge of computers... Stay motivated! Keep up the good work! Best wishes!

PS: Aam khaate rehna!
PJ master. Famous for his 20GB collection  ;P. Geek. Real explorer. Humble. 9.2.

Best wishes! Enjoy max! I would forever remember that hackathon, the TC68 days, your office :P and what not.... 
PS next time you use turmeric against ants, let others know too that it's not black magic! :P

I admire your passion to travel and explore things. I am grateful for your advises, I wish I had followed all of them. You introduced me to so many good things I was unaware of.  I won't forget the days when you understood me most in my bad times.
The smartest person of IITI. Famous for his witty nature and hardwork.

I admire your utter motivation and dedication. You're constantly smiling and never give up, no matter how the circumstances are (it is a different matter altogether that you yourself create difficult situations a lot many times). Though you may not realise, you taught me how to connect with the community and do something worthwhile for it. Continue meeting me often, brother.
G: It's My Life What Ever I Wanna Do

E: Jack of all trades. MVP of our batch. CR7>=Messi ;P.  Will repeat Marriott episode for sure.

You are the reason I could I get into IIT Indore otherwise I had no idea of branches and even I didn't know anything like IIT Indore. I am thankful to you that you called me that day and discussed about counselling. I wouldn't have achieved this much if it wasn't IIT Indore. 
Thank you for motivating us for running and good health. 
As promised invite me to your wedding please.
Really kind and light-hearted person. First roomie. Ladkibaaaz ;P
Thanks for your notes bro. The most humble guy at IITI.

Thank you for teaching me linked list in bus to pacl :D 
I won't forget the days when you come to visit me many times a day to check if II was doing well in my bad times. 
Don't ask a girl out on 14th feb, it doesn't work.
CR of out batch ;P. Gourinath sir loves him. Coolest guy of IITI.

You're a legend for all that you established even before coming to college; I hope you understand the nature of the exploits I mention here. Apart from these accomplishments, I have come to adore your candid and uncomplicated world view during our cherished time in college. Let's meet soon and continue to agree on our shared political views, brother.
Highly motivated in solving maths problems and learning concepts which involves logic. He spends lots of money in useless things and still says "Mai Garib hu".
He never gets angry I still remember we used to call him motto in our coaching classes he was like chilled out. He can give a simple answer to any question you ask.

Studies might not have been your cup of tea but you still managed to do decently in all your courses, something I appreciate a lot because of the hard work you put in. Having said that, I am one of your biggest supporters when it comes to your talent in rapping. You're a unique gem amongst us who has a talent for writing impactful lyrics and I hope you make it big soon, brother.

Haq se Single!ðŸ”¥
Patte dikhau kya?
I drink and I know things.

Rahul is not just a friend of mine; more like a brother to me. Though he is from IIT Indore, but he is more fascinated towards IIM Indore ( :P). He is one of my best buddy, to whom i can go to anytime and can share anything. From flatmates in 1st year, to roommates in second year, to BTP partner, and so on..... I have countless number  of memories with him which i will always cherish. 
I wish you a bright future ahead and may you achieve all your dreams. Keep scoring. I wish IIT and IIM go hand in hand xD (YKWIM). Cheers to our friendship and happy memories of our college days, and many more in years to come. Good luck bro.
Gaming Boy. Marvel Fan. Fun loving and light hearted guy.
Savage Humour. Witty. Watches movies and TV series at 1.5X. Nolan Fan.

He becomes earnest before the night of the exam and used revise notes 2-3 times so that he can remember every line of notes. His writing skill is amazing when it comes to poetry and rapper of our batch.
Hardworker, intelligent and Bluff master ;P.
Humble. Helpful.Hacker. Chadha ki udane wala ;P

Ok, after having a glance at his CPI, you can call him a nerd. But having been with him for 4 years, including roomates for 3 semesters, I take this liberty of saying that he was never into books or studies as his CPI reflects. He is the most complete man, I have come across in my short life. He is a man to be.
G: Too many songs, songs were Integral part of our friendship. But still I would add the one, with whom out so many memories are associated with. Mask off by Future, Rahul macha, let's ask Radhe our favourite question, *what would you do, chase a check or chase a bitch?*

E: All-rounder bro. Tell him a thing, and he'll excel it. Our fond memory will always be the code language which we talk to, which can save us in any situation. I will never forget those late night deep shit life conversations which we had about how to achieve everything and going to night canteen to get a Chaas in Silver Springs. SEAKAM would always have been a mystery without you! Stay the same, and keep motivating us!
G: Rihanna O Rihanna, Police Station is the Thana, Vaha pe General Store hai, Yaha pe hai Kirana!

E: Has the most amazing captions. Hacker. Humble. Casanova ;P
Geeky. Humble. Kind. Childlike. 1-2 marks ke liye rone wali ;P

Thanks for helping me to pass in all the exams! Yoga-king and chick-slayer. Are you ever going to take us to Radisson? Scores 105/100 marks in all the exams, 5 marks for extra sympathy from the professor. There could be no one in this world more diplomatic than you. :P Top-class anchoring who knows how to engage the whole audience. Fluxus needs you as the host! Too much nerdish for a Drama Club Member.
He is a person in our batch how has kept open all sorts of future plans  MBA, PSU, Future First, Mtech and till the end he has not finalized what to do. He is always in a mood to tease.
Never misses an opportunity. Helpful. Sasta-hacker ;P

Best friend and secret-keeper one could ever ask for. Too frank and open in all the situations. I still remember the competition we used to have on who will solve more number of Codechef problems by stalking the profiles. And how could I forget the Ahmedabad food trip? Half hour of eating, half hour in the washroom! Foodie who shares the same taste and spice level! There would be no place in the country which you haven't visited. I still don't know how do we both see the same youtube videos and interviews sitting in different rooms and places. "Start saying NO to people, or else people are going to take you for granted."

Most humble and down to earth guy. Way too sensitive to climate changes. Crazy Marvel fan! Eats code and geeksforgeeks blogs for breakfast. Will always say no to all the trips and then call asking to bring McD food.  Our best memory will always be the Tic-Tac-Toe game which we made with 5000 lines of labour code. Did sexting way before when it was cool. Dank memes over normies! Never forget the two pacts bro:
1. Always put proxy if the other is not present.
2. Never mock if you are in a group.
Keep on grabbing more offers and chicks like you always do! "Have fun rather than planning fun!"
G: Everyday I spend my time Drinking wine, feeling fine Waiting here to find the sign That I can understand Yes I am

E: There is hardly any secret that I haven't shared with him, from our personal lives to others'. Really sorry to all those, who had their secrets with me, and expected to keep my mouth shut, Sumit knows it. Surviving these 4 years wouldn't have been possible without this guy. Thank you Sumit for being in my life.

Over-enthusiastic guy. Did almost everything possible in these 4 years. Most of them being famous, while some of them not so memorable. Not sure if anyone else would have survived, if he would been through the things, Utkarsh been through. Always a motivation. Utkarsh, even if Tayal refuses your proposal, I will always be there for you. P.S. Really excited to see you embracing Jainism. See you soon, Maacha.

Man, you are such a beautiful person. Always righteous, honest, caring! The entire batch loves you! Surely going to miss all those debates about ethics and politics. Thanks for always filling me with hope with your kind words. Much respect brother! I will always have your back.

I don't know why we weren't friends in the first year even after living in the same flat. You are a great guy who does a lot of RR ðŸ˜‚. We have shared a lot of time together talking about sooo many things. Being with you was always fun and I'm surely gonna miss that for the rest of my life. I still hate not being able to go on a trip with you. Probably in future we will. Let's just hope all your dreams get fulfilled before that and you finally get satisfied :').
G: I'll be there for you by Rembrandts

E: Ran into this macha on the IIT Indore discussions FB group, since then no turning back. B. Tech was possible only because of this man. Only thing that was common among us, both were single. We used to talk about our this weak point for hours. Hope you don't have to stay like that for long. BTW, do you remember the trips that Rahul, you and I used to plan every day? Let's make at least one of them possible. Also let's meet Deepak Sharma and Pramod Dubey together before dying.ðŸ˜…
G: Dil Dhadakne Do - Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara

E: Fond of photos!! Literally, he can edit a photo for hours. Wants to enjoy life to the fullest.
He talks way less than a regular guy during our BTP he was avoiding conversation with our BTP adviser. Always wants to follow the rules and always ready to help.
I spent the highest amount of time in my BTech with you buddy! Always remember one thing that Pranay will always be there for you to share all your emotions :)

You always wonder about three things: my best friend, my love interest and my racism. You are a better friend to me than the list of people whom you address as my best friends. Coming to my love interest, matha IITI m koi nhi hai promise. Finally, about racism I say would that "Buri aadat hai par kya karu aadat pad gayi :P", just kidding da! There's no such thing and I know that even you receive it in a funny way :)

Your the guy in IITI with whom I have the highest amount of sync in the thought process. Our discussions turned nights into days and they mostly bring some interest in me and I continue to keep thinking in that direction. I would love to do a project with you (Till date I would say that I was not clear about not taking BTP with you). We should definitely plan a road trip together bro :)

This is to one who is quite friendly girl. One who is my partner in drinking cold drink(hanumantiya)ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. I like to take pen from her. One who is always ready to do any adventure.Those late nytt bitching to all those beautiful memories of 4 yr  has  turned this  relationship of friendship into sis/saliðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£ bond.

E: Biggest racist of IITI, bina suncream k bahar ni niklega coz "me tan ho jaunga to baaki log mujhse gore lagenge". Loves calling everyone nigga. Over thinks alot(alot seriously). And loves giving GYAN and has alot of best friends(alot seriously).
G: Hum kaale h to kya kare dil wale h ðŸ˜ðŸ˜

E: Love Guru of our gang. Thoda style kam maara kar. Great Dancer(while dancing we automatically sync steps during DJ nights). Sasta SRK. Emotional or should I say romantic (looking at the frequency of video calls). Video call room pe kiya kar

E:
This one is for the default stud of IITI. Man, you are a real hard worker. I still remember the days when you studied till the very last point and slept in the sitting position... haha... Great luck bro! Always by your side! Take care! Stay a stud, that's your default ;)

"Keep calm and throw no coconuts."

Great friend! First roomie! We have really contrasting personalities and yet we could become such great friends! Love you man! Take care! Chase your dreams! Stay in touch, never hesitate to call me up! :D
G: Champion - DJ Bravo, and Habibi (Ahmad Chowki)

E: Hacker! I envy your phones! Studying with you was so much fun! Right mix of tech and humour. Haha! Let's keep trolling Dhruv whenever we get to. I think this is the common link between us! All the best man! I know you gonna nail it!

Bhaiii! You got some real swagger, humour and coolness. Always loved your company... Stay the same man! See you soon! Best of luck for the road ahead! Machate rehana!

"Bhai Kahan hai, Gaadi nikalo"
Beat boxer! Chepu! Keep that coolness man! Always enjoyed your company! Keep in touch... Hope we meet soon. Dying to hear your "dhum dhum dash, dhapad dhapad". All the best!

I remember having so much fun with you! Cracking jokes and just saying anything! and you always took them in such a playful manner, never getting offended or serious! It's a great quality dude, and that's how we became great friends because I somehow enjoyed meeting and talking to a pure soul like yours! Keep it up! May you reach great heights! Chase your dreams! I am always there to talk, to chill, to crack jokes and waiting for your new songs.. haha!
G: Haan Hasi Ban Gaye (shubhi po version)

E: AIR 72 - That one semester with you was so much fun! You and fatal abusing each other all the time! You are a real hard worker, a man with potential, and you proved it right in the end! All the very best man!

Stud! Smarty! In you I see a great friend and man with great potential. I really feel, you are among the smart ones of our batch! May you reach places, you truly deserve! Thanks for all the time buddy! I remember all the great time you, I and Rahul had! All those evening walks, talks of interviews, you coming to study at the last moment.. haha!!

We met through the FB group for JEE counselling. I remember you reached IITI before me and I asked you to send the hostel room pics. Thanks for being around man! You are among my few friends who were always there when I needed help! I am always there for you! Stay the same! Consider reducing weight though haha! You are really pure at heart, always wishing great for me from the depths of your heart... Keep those wishes coming, I really need them! Let's meet soon!

Bro, you are a real hardworker and such a calm personality! wow! Got to know you better in 2nd year, and from then our friendship just got stronger and stronger. You have a real passion for coding! Please keep that up! Wish you great luck! May you reach great heights! Always remember this friend of yours ... :D

Hey friend! I remember meeting you back in first year, in silver springs mess, when you were having an enormous amount of rice and I was fat... You are a really calm person, someone who never lost control of senses, someone who has a great control on emotions! I don't know how you do it! Software engineering project was so much fun... when we coded with the Kala Chasma song in background and danced after every day's work! Love you man! Stay awesome! Do great work!
G: They see me rollin' / Kala Chasma

E: The most honest, the most mature, the most genuine of all! My great friend! Remember we used to do that slomo dance in first year! I first met you when you were testing Alpha Go for robosoccer! I felt so happy to know that you were from MP... we became a family soon after, you being the mature elder brother, who took great care of me!

My first best friend at IIT Indore. You made me feel home and comfortable when I knew no one around. Travelling around in buses, we became great friends! Thanks for teaching me hill climb racing... even that music makes me feel nostalgic now! Keep doing great buddy! I still have those i5 selfies! See you soon!

Too lazy for everything. Give him a million dollars for free in Taste Buds, and he will sleep peacefully in his room. After all, comfort >>> everything. Always looks for knowledge rather than completing the task, even if that means compromising on the assignments and project deadlines. Vim King, ML Lord and Best Researcher! Our best memories are made at 12am just before project deadlines when we crack up shit together! Thanks for teaching me all Ubuntu commands! The guy you will always find behind the camera smiling 24*7! Stay the same, mah rich boi!
G: Behti hawa sa tha voh, udti patang sa tha voh

E: Perect Allrounder. Four consecutive 10 pointers, bitches whenever required, general knowledge as high as sky and sincerity on an another level! An ideal Sharmaji ka ladka. IOS + Mac = Deadly Combination. Ardent Messi Fan. Remember the times when we used to discuss which is the best place to eat daal bati on? Also, the night where we kept on making web pages every half hour just to find out everything was in vain? If you find that Rahul has not solved a question, it implies that the question is wrong. Tanveer vs Tanvi is a tough battle, but he somehow manages to strike the perfect balance between both.  Stay motivated always and keep spreading the energetic vibes!
G: ae malik tere bande hum, aise ho tumhare karam.

E: ML Lord! You give him a phone and a wifi connection and keep him alone for 1 hour, he will come back with atleast 20k extra cash in hand. Freelance king! Tell him a topic in CS, and he will tell you everything. Tell him 3 details of any girl in campus, he will tell you the name as well as the room number of the girl along with her relationship status. One memory which I will never forget is the one in Gurukripa where you drank all the water in the finger bowl thinking it was lemon juice and asking afterwards why is it hot? Stay calm and focused! The best is yet to come!
G: Tum jaise ch****o ka sahara hai doston.

E: Dadaji at campus, great person, always encouraging! We were friends from long, but became very good friends only in the last year,  I wish I met you early! Amazing person!
G: kahoon dost se dost ki baat kya kya

E: Amazing and talented person, with a potential to earn thousands in minutes! Constant friend from first year and the bond became stronger with every passing year. D.R bhool jana pr SAM ko mat bhoolna bhaiya!
G: hum kaale hai to kya hua dilwale hai

E: Roommates, the one who gave me shelter and was with me in times of trouble! The last man standing, won't forget that!
G: Tera yaar hoon me (Tu jo rootha, toh kaun hasega..)

E: Runner of the batch! May you improve with every marathon, not just in running but every obstacle of life. Sometimes, I just get stumped admiring your thoughts and philosophies, you have been a motivation in times when I needed the most of it! I hope our bonds stays like that forever! And, yes, need to plan a trip! :)
G: Yaari hai imaan mera yaar meri zindagi

E:
She is very emotionally strong person.Very Stubborn and rude sometimes.Apurva is her daughter and she loves her more than anyone (from iiti).Loves dogs more than humans.A very good friend to have by your side but takes forever to get ready.Very lazy and very practical.Dont trust her when she says she will gety ready in 5 minutes!you have to wait for 1 hour.One of rare girls who plays PUBG.She has this great instinct of winning every situation that makes her special.She eats so slowly that all of us can eat twice in same time and that's why sharing food with us was not affordable for herðŸ˜‚.She wants her hair to be straight but sadly her hair are as stubborn as herðŸ˜….Her family was beautiful hosts for all of our batch and used to send Ghar ka khana for us people. She never went outside Indore for her whole life (except vacation though) and try to defend Indore and MP in debates.Being true Indore she likes sev very much and even had idea to make sev flavored ice cream ðŸ¤£.It was a grt experience to have such person in my life and definitely a person worth to be obsessed with. She always live in reality and avoids unnecessary imaginary perfect world. I can see her as a successful person in her future.
She needs to be more emotionally present in friendships thoughðŸ˜›
G: Tu jaha jaha chalega Mera saaya sath hoga
